title: Experience with contextual field research
proctitle: CHI '89: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

references.text: Campbell, R.L. Evaluating online assistance empirically. IBM Research Report RC 13410, Yorktown Heights, NY, 1988.
Digital Equipment Corp. XUI Style Guide. Order No. AA-MG20A-TE, Maynard, MA, Dec. 1988.
Dreyfus, H. L. and Dreyfus, S. E. Mind over Machine. The Free Press, New York, 1986.
Gould, J. D. How to design usable systems. In M. Helander (Ed.), Handbook of Human-Computer Interaction, North-Holland, Amsterdam, 1988, pp. 757-789.
Mack, R. and Nielsen, J. Software integration in the professional work environment: Observations on requirements, usage and interface issues. IBM Research Report RC 12677, Yorktown Heights, NY, 1987.

Nielsen, J., Mack, R. L., Bergendorff, IC H. and Grisehkowslcy, N.L. Integrated software usage in the professional work environment: Evidence from questionnaires and interviews. In Proceedings of the CHI '86 Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems, (Boston, April 13-17), ACM, New York, 1986, pp. 162-167.

Whiteside, J., Bennett, J. and Holtzblatt, tC Usability engineering: Our experience and evolution. In M. Helander (Ed.), Handbook of Human-Computer Inter. action, North-Holland, Amsterdam, 1988, pp. 791-817.
Winograd, T. and Flores, F. Understanding Computers and Cognition: A New Foundation for Design. Ablex, Norwood, NJ, 1986.
